metadata.title: CVE-2022-21505 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Kernel lockdown bypass when UEFI secure boot is disabled / unavailable andIMA appraisal is enabled.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
